<h1>The package dplyr</h1>

<h3>General info</h3>
The package dplyr has functions to help you work with data stored in a data.frame.  Many of the things that are challenging to do with the built-in functions are easy to do with functions from dplyr.  For example, you easily select certain rows, or summarize data.
